name: wk-06-build-a-blog
description: Build A React App Blog for our week 06 assignment

scripts.dev: webpack -d && cp src/index.html dist/index.html && cp -R src/app/images dist/app && webpack-dev-server --content-base src/ --inline --hot
scripts.postinstall: webpack -p && cp src/index.html dist/index.html && -R src/app/images dist/app

author: Kevin Black <Kevin_Jay_Black@hotmail.com> (https://github.com/KevinUtah-tiy)
